机上チェック: (きじょうチェック) - desk checking

机下: (きか) - word of respect added to the addressee's name on a letter; under the desk

李下: (りか) - underneath a Japanese plum tree
李下に冠を整さず: (りかにかんむりをたださず) - (proverb) leave no room for scandal; don't do anything that can be misinterpreted; don't straighten your cap under a plum tree (because when you raise your hands it might look as if you're trying to steal the plums)
